select.isEqual: SELECT A.YY AS YEAR , A.MON , A.DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_NM , A.APRV_QUAT , A.BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM (SELECT YY , '01' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '02' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '03' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '04' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '05' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '06' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '07' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '08' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '09' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '10' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '11' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '12' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B) A INNER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_ID WHERE YY = #findYear# AND MON = #findMon# AND B.DEPT_ID = #findDeptId# ORDER BY YY, MON, DEPT_CD
